titleStmt.title: The Sentence of Nathaniel Thompson, VVilliam Pain, and John Farewel who received judgment at the Kings-Bench, Westminster, on the third of this instant July, as haveing been cast at Guild-Hall for writing, printing and publishing the letters & libels purporting that Sir Edmundbury-Godfrey murthered himself.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
